product_name: REI Classic Duffel Bag - XX Large - Special Buy
long_description: Cavernous only begins to describe our XX Large REI Classic Duffel Bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit into it, and comes with its own stuff sack. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag. Tote the XX Large REI Classic Duffel Bag comfortably with the included adjustable shoulder strap. Special buy.
short_description: Cavernous only begins to describe our XX Large REI Classic Duffel Bag, which swallows up 9,150 cu. in. worth of gear, clothing or whatever else you can fit into it, and comes with its own stuff sack.
